thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Tony

author: Tony
title: Tony
text: This is the first time that my husband and I have used Flighthub to purchase our airline tickets. We are very pleased with the prices that you have to offer in comparison to other companies. We received our itinerary and confirmation very quickly in order to ensure that our flight was booked. We are sure that our trip to and from Palm Springs will go smoothly with all connections being on time and without unknown disruptions. Thank you very much in making our decision to go to Palm Springs that much easier.
